channel.title: At what number
channel.description:
At what number is a game/film series dead? I would go for around 4, but then it seems they start making Xgame 3: The X chronicles 2, or just Xgame: X.
Well I say 4 because of CNC4 :meh:
what do you guys think?:retard:

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Scrue
item.description:
too much FF

Read full topic

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Morrussian
item.description:
Theevilpplz:

There are one or two sequels, like Final Fantasy X2, and all the sequels to Final Fantasy VII, but other than that, you are basically right.

Although actually the universe of FFX is meant to be a distant prequel and the same univers of FFVII, but those hints aren’t shown until X2, in case anyone decided to care d:

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Morpheon
item.description:
Scrue:

At what number is a game/film series dead?
I would go for around 4, but then it seems they start making Xgame 3: The X chronicles 2, or just Xgame: X.

Well I say 4 because of CNC4 :meh:

what do you guys think?:retard:

Well, Shrek ended at 4 and so did Indiana Jones; But that won’t stop people from making crappy prequels or spin-offs…

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

I really only hate it when its a weapon that I just get later anyways. If your just going to give me a weapon why not now when I just killed an enemy using it god damn it. The only gun that I couldn’t get my hands on that bugged me was Father Gregory’s (If you don’t know who he is seriously gtfo the forums) gun the Annabell. That only bugged me cuz I couldn’t even use it in gmod, hell in gmod any NPC could use it but I still can’t :’(

Yes you can. It just shows the regular shotgun model and only has 2 shells and you can’t reload. I don’t care as much when the weapon seems worse than anything you have, only when it’s better.

Read full topic

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Theevilpplz
item.description:
Maverix26:

Actually, if I’m correct, all the games have no relationship between each other. Each game has a different plot, with different characters. So if I’m right (which i don’t know if i am d then they’re all different games with no sequel d: Again, I’m not completely sure, considering Ive never felt like playing those games.

There are one or two sequels, like Final Fantasy X2, and all the sequels to Final Fantasy VII, but other than that, you are basically right.

Read full topic

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: eateroftheflame
item.description:
3 but it normally depends on the series. Some manage double digits easily, others are already dead at 1.

Read full topic

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: b737lvr
item.description:
There is no number. Its only what the game developer makes it. Like resident evil, if you ask me it stopped being fun after RE4 (i know there was 0 and code veronica). RE5 was a complete bummer in my book. i quit playing after 2 chapters.

With Left 4 Dead i think they can go to a Left 4 Dead 3 if they put WAY more effort than they did 1 and 2. Such as A lot more weapons and a more misleading world.

Now for Armed Assault, I hope they make a Third with even BETTER graphics. Even thought II had uberawsmefantasticextravaganso graphics its probably unlikely that if a 3rd is made its gonna have different graphics.

For those of you who need to pull their hhead out of their ass here is Armed Assault II:
WATCH IN HD MUTHA F@%#ERS!!!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OiDu1tLMAEg

BTW,
If anyone starts talking shit and COMPARING MW2 and ARMAII i will send Chuck Norris to falcon punch you in the ballz.

Read full topic

I really only hate it when its a weapon that I just get later anyways. If your just going to give me a weapon why not now when I just killed an enemy using it god damn it. The only gun that I couldn’t get my hands on that bugged me was Father Gregory’s (If you don’t know who he is seriously gtfo the forums) gun the Annabell. item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
Fnoigy:

PS: Games should NEVER not let you use a weapon you see somebody else using, especially if it’s a good one.

and why is this? I mean, call me crazy, but if i encountered, say, a boss, with a plasma cannon or something, I’d sure as hell want to get it after I defeat him. same would go for normal enemies.

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Morrussian
item.description:
Kairouseki:

ファイナルファンタジー
Fainalu Fantajii

Kind of hard to mistranslate something written in English :retard: .

Not only that, but it was called Final Fantasy exactly B/C of what Deimos said, G4 did a thing on Nobuo Uematsu, the guy behind the music for every game so far but 13, and he had said that Square was a failing company, if the game didn’t work it would literally be their final fantasy game. It worked, and because people loved it, the name just stuck.

Read full topic

I didn’t say Crysis was like Halo 2, I’m just saying the gameplay video we got from E3 made Crysis 2 look like Halo 2 with a face lift and a fancy watch.

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
The gameplay demo wasn’t too amazing, but some of the screenshots seems to show a somewhat more open world for Crysis 2. In anycase, Crysis never felt to me like Halo 2, even when it became more linear, so I’m not concerned.

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Fnoigy
item.description:
jerry:

How is that a bad thing?

Yes, since it’s going from Predator: The Game (with really neat-looking, though somewhat-uninteresting-to-fight-aliens) to Generic Humanoid Alien Shooter. It’d be like if they totally removed any ability for you to cause havoc in Roller Coaster Tycoon.

hercule poirots nutsack:

things usutally get pretty shit at the point they abandone numbers in favour of words. liek alien resurrection or something

Waddya sayin’ dere, bub? Dem’s fightin’ woids.

item.title: At what number
item.dc:creator: Maverix26
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

13, because how many more fucking Final Fantasies are there going to be before they get to the FINAL fantasy. I really don’t ‘get’ those games to be honest…

Actually, if I’m correct, all the games have no relationship between each other. Each game has a different plot, with different characters. So if I’m right (which i don’t know if i am d then they’re all different games with no sequel d: Again, I’m not completely sure, considering Ive never felt like playing those games.
